caption:
“God walks the same streets as we do.”

Reflection:
In crowded cities and empty alleys alike, divinity keeps pace beside us. The sacred never lags behind the secular.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that no place is too modern for God. Faith belongs as much to the streets as to the sanctuary.
